is.hello.buruberi.example.presenters

Class PeripheralPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hello.buruberi.example.presenters.BasePresenter
      • is.hello.buruberi.example.presenters.PeripheralPresenter

  • @Singleton
public class PeripheralPresenter
extends BasePresenter
    Wraps the connectivity and bond state of a Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral and provides observable hooks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      rx.subjects.ReplaySubject<java.lang.Boolean> bonded
      The bond state of the peripheral.

      The connected state of the peripheral.

      rx.Observable<GattPeripheral> connect()
      Attempts to connect to the peripheral, timing out after 30 seconds if the remote peripheral does not respond.

      • setPeripheral

        public void setPeripheral(GattPeripheral peripheral)
        Set the peripheral whose state the presenter should track.

      • getPeripheral

        public GattPeripheral getPeripheral()

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()

      • isBonded

        public boolean isBonded()

      • connect

        public rx.Observable<GattPeripheral> connect()
        Attempts to connect to the peripheral, timing out after 30 seconds if the remote peripheral does not respond.

        Updates the value of connected upon completion.

      • disconnect

        public rx.Observable<GattPeripheral> disconnect()
        Attempts to disconnect from the peripheral. Does nothing if the peripheral is not currently connected.

        Updates the value of connected upon completion.

      • createBond

        public rx.Observable<GattPeripheral> createBond()
        Attempts to pair with the peripheral.

        Updates the value of bonded upon completion.

        See Also:
        for more info about this method's behavior.

      • removeBond

        public rx.Observable<GattPeripheral> removeBond()
        Attempts to un-pair with the peripheral, timing out after 30 seconds if the peripheral does not respond.

        Updates the value of bonded upon completion.

        See Also:
        for more info about this method's behavior.
